root.name: Disgaea DS
root.description: Overview Visuals and gameplay are similar to previous entries to the series Disgaea DS is a port of a PSP remake of Disgaea: Hour of Darkness. Very few features were added or removed from the PSP version to the DS. The added features included utilizing the DS's touchscreen and the two screens to improve the interface. Menu's could be easily navigated using the touch screen or buttons, and the top screen was used only for a battle map. The features that were removed from the PSP version were involved with the DS's small memory storage. There was no longer an option to change spoken dialogue from English to Japanese, and there was much less spoken dialogue included.
